description:
Job Description:

Pay Range $21hr - $26hr

Responsibilities:
  • Partner with the Manager of Business Operations to identify opportunities or issues that could impact the organization's ability to successfully, safely, and effectively achieve our objectives.
  • Establish a communications infrastructure within the Operations team, identifying vehicles and methods to keep team members informed and engaged and drive business results.
  • Work closely with Corporate Communications.
  • Build and maintain relationships with the following supporting teams including but not limited to AV, IT, Facilities, Telcom, Catering, and HR.
  • Maintain and execute the comprehensive onboarding process for new hires or transfers.
Qualifications:
  • 2-3 years of experience.
  • Bachelor’s Degree or Equivalent Preferred and HS diploma required.
  • Aside from being a service-minded and highly organized individual, in order to be fully successful in the role and maximize candidate potential.
  • Looking for the following: Strong Project Management / Program Management experience – this is a hands-on role, and some project management experience is desired to be successful in this role.
  • Delivery to tight deadlines – there will be a lot to do and not a lot of time to do it.
  • Proven ability to manage a large workload, prioritize, and deliver high-quality output will be essential.
  • Communication Skills – the role requires the ability to communicate and engage throughout the organization, both in written and verbal form.
  • Strong presentation skills are a must.
  • Service orientation and strong relationship-building skills are critical.
